plot: A teenaged girl is executed for going against a king's wishes and honoring her brother's death.
title: Die Antigone des Sophokles nach der Hölderlinschen Übertragung für die Bühne bearbeitet von Brecht 1948 (Suhrkamp Verlag)
plot_es: A teenaged girl is executed for going against a king's wishes and honoring her brother's death.
original_name: Die Antigone des Sophokles nach der Hölderlinschen Übertragung für die Bühne bearbeitet von Brecht 1948 (Suhrkamp Verlag)
plot_en: A teenaged girl is executed for going against a king's wishes and honoring her brother's death.
